issue.message: This call references a method added in API level 28; however, the containing class androidx.camera.integration.antelope.CameraUtilsKt is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.

This call references a method added in API level 26; however, the containing class androidx.camera.integration.antelope.cameracontrollers.CameraXControllerKt is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
